data.proxyObjectName: rectangular two-tone yellow and green kitchen sponge
data.utilizationMethod: Place the sponge flat on the desk with the soft yellow side facing up and glide the pen tip across its surface while pressing lightly to compress the foam.
Grip the wooden handle near its middle with thumb and fingers and guide the bristle end like a marker tip

data.proxyObjectName: yellow snack bag with Japanese writing
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the lower portion of the bag and push contents toward the top by sliding thumb upward along the back

data.proxyObjectName: blue and white Pilot FriXion eraser box
data.utilizationMethod: Lay the closed box flat on its largest face; glide the battery tip across the smooth top panel.
Hold the pen near its tip with a pencil grip and perform fine wrist strokes and gentle rotations.

data.proxyObjectName: black and silver telescopic selfie stick
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the foam grip firmly, extend the pole, rest the phone clamp lightly against a wall or desk, and drive the arm forward and back in long strokes.
